Title: A Celestial Experience
Description:
The human calf is arguing on our behalf. He is well-spoken; I can see why Baine Bloodhoof regards the prince so highly.

Still, the argument does not go well. I am of little consequence, but you are a hero of the Horde. Perhaps you can intercede in our favor?

Speak with the White Tiger and plead our case, $r.

Be careful! He may set a number of challenges before you...
ObjectivesText: Speak to Xuen and pass his tests.
